mapper.insert: insert into pet (pid, pname, uid, sid, col) values (#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{col,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select pid, pname, uid, sid, col,url from pet
select pid, pname, uid, sid, col,url from pet where uid=#{uid}
